block.p: A new slate for the Jewish Museum in Manhattan: On Thursday, the board elected E. ROBERT GOODKIND chairman of the museum and ROBERT J. HURST president.

Mr. Goodkind, a founder of and a senior partner in the New York law firm of Goodkind, Labaton, Rudoff & Sucharow, is chairman of the board of the American Jewish Committee and chairman emeritus of the Jewish Foundation for Christian Rescuers of the Anti-Defamation League. He has also been chairman of the American Academy of Dramatic Arts.
A new slate for the Jewish Museum in Manhattan: On Thursday, the board elected E. ROBERT GOODKIND chairman of the museum and ROBERT J. HURST president.

Mr. Goodkind, a founder of and a senior partner in the New York law firm of Goodkind, Labaton, Rudoff & Sucharow, is chairman of the board of the American Jewish Committee and chairman emeritus of the Jewish Foundation for Christian Rescuers of the Anti-Defamation League. He has also been chairman of the American Academy of Dramatic Arts.

Mr. Hurst, a general partner in Goldman, Sachs, is vice chairman of Clark University and a member of the graduate executive board of the Wharton School. He and Mr. Goodkind were elected to two-year terms. NADINE BROZAN
